attributes.title: Killed my grandma
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my grandma because she didnt know how and she opened it and it flashed white with the words “white supremacy” really quickly and my grandma started seizing. I took her to the hospital but it was too late. This app made my grandma die in my arms 😭

attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review: This app doesn’t work. It crashes far too often, for some reason it has age restricted materials (not appropriate), and the “rewards” the app promises is just a bunch of white lies. It’s just plain wrong for the president to have such a bad app.

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see what this clown was up to and I was disgusted to see that the Cheeto puff was on it. To improve this app I would highly recommend changing the name and removing everything on it that is related to the forbidden orange man. Thanks for you time! Harry styles 2020!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The loading screen gave a seizure I’m epileptic and the t spinning causes one of my episodes🤪 next time add a trigger warning 🙈🙈 anyway dear Donnie boy please tell Fox News stop talking about teenage girls and their political opinions it’s starting to seem like they’re seeking it out anyway #settleforbiden2020

attributes.title: Great App #Trump2020
attributes.review: Now I feel part of the campaign team! Got all the info I need !!

attributes.title: I just wanted to support 💗🧚🏽
attributes.review: all i want to do was show some support to my fav 🍊but as soon as a downloaded the app my phone 📱 keep crashing and making weird noises the noises scared my 🐱 and made him cry 😭 i would recommend this app for anyone 🧚🏽💗🥺✨🍊

attributes.title: Donald Trump is your president
attributes.review: I love our President! I like how the app gives updates on the Trump Campaign.

attributes.title: I’m throwing up
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever seen. It’s not easy to navigate and it crashes the country a lot. This app should not be allowed to exist any more. Just looking at the screen when this app is open makes me sick to my stomach

attributes.title: GROSS 🤢🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: Ugh I got this app to keep up to date with our lovely President, but nothing even worked!! The loading screen was too long, and nothing seemed to function properly!! I do not recommend, it’s a crap app, ugh so disappointed!! 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Truly disgusted
attributes.review: This app shot my whole family in front of me and then proceeded to kidnap my child. The pain and suffering this app has caused me is unbelievably terrible.  Please do not download this app for the safety of you and your family I am sincerely disappointed with it:(
